entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:24 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
